attributes.action: Ban the sale of Fireworks to the public.
attributes.additional_details: It's disturbing that teenagers have access to fireworks, they know the dangers that come with them but it doesn't stop them from making stupid choices. I feel that fireworks should only be used at local places for event purposes only and should be banned completely from being sold to the public.
attributes.background:
This past week one night I heard people setting firworks off in the park located near my house, it appeared to be a group of teenagers doing so. 
I witnessed a teenage boy put a firework in my neighbour's garden and set it off.
